result.title: Project Management Plan v1
result.description:
A document summarizing all the required knowledge for the good management of the project (in terms of administrative forms, financial aspects, quality process, etc.). Particularly this document will contain the following lines:
Planning of meetings Management system description Definition of rules to ensure effective team work Controlling and monitoring structure t Guidelines for financial reporting, Project Risk Management Plan Work Breakdown Structure (WBS): with the assignment of responsibilities and timing.
This deliverable is associated with task 1.1.1
